sentences.en: Aerial bombing of rebel positions is continuing.
sentences.cn: 对叛军阵地的空中轰炸正在继续。
反政府的叛乱分子攻击该镇。
他赢得了“反叛牧师”的称号。

sentences.en: I was instantly branded as a rebel.
sentences.cn: 转眼间我被诬蔑为叛徒。

sentences.en: If Douglas came down hard enough on him, Dale would rebel.
sentences.cn: 如果道格拉斯对戴尔太过严厉，他就会反抗。

sentences.en: Rebel artillery units have regularly bombarded the airport.
sentences.cn: 叛军的炮兵部队经常轰炸机场。

sentences.en: Rebel sources have so far reacted cautiously to the threat.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，反叛分子面对威胁的反应非常谨慎。

sentences.en: Reports from Chad suggest that rebel forces are advancing on the capital.
sentences.cn: 来自乍得的报告显示叛军正向首都推进。

sentences.en: She had been a rebel at school.
sentences.cn: 她在学校时就是个叛逆者。

sentences.en: The capital is still under constant bombardment by the rebel forces.
sentences.cn: 首都仍在遭受叛军的持续轰炸。

sentences.en: The rebel forces simply bypassed Zwedru on their way further south.
sentences.cn: 叛军在向南部挺进时直接绕过了绥德鲁。

sentences.en: The rebel leader was a fugitive from justice.
sentences.cn: 叛军头目是一名在逃的不法之徒。

sentences.en: The rebel soldiers tried repeatedly to storm the building.
sentences.cn: 叛军屡次尝试强攻这座建筑。

sentences.en: The rebel soldiers were forced to surrender.
They are in twice daily radio contact with the rebel leader.
sentences.cn: 他们每天用无线电和叛军首领联系两次。

sentences.en: They were now deep inside rebel territory.
sentences.cn: 他们现在已深入叛军占领区。

sentences.en: Voters rebelled against high property taxes.
sentences.cn: 投票者们反对高额财产税。

words.tran_cn: 反抗的；造反的；难控制的

trans.tran_cn: 反政府的人，反叛者，造反者，叛逆者
trans.tran_en: someone who opposes or fights against people in authority
to oppose or fight against someone in authority or against an idea or situation which you do not agree with

trans.tran_cn: 反叛， 造反； 反对， 不服从
trans.tran_en: to oppose or fight against someone in authority or against an idea or situation which you do not agree with
